title: Charles.Laughton.Directs.The.Night.of.the.Hunter.2002.DVDRip.AC3
description:
Charles.Laughton.Directs.The.Night.of.the.Hunter.2002.DVDRip.AC3.x264-GCJM

=======

Filled with out-takes, rushes, behind the scene footage and audible
off-camera direction Charles Laughton Directs.. is a two and a half
hour documentary focusing on Laughton's sole directorial offering,
The Night of the Hunter; considered a failure upon it's release,
now recognised as a classic and preserved by the US National Film
Registry.
